siteMetadata.title: A11yTalks
siteMetadata.subtitle: Virtual meet-up featuring speakers & conversations around digital accessibility.

frontmatter.title: Screen Readers and CSS - Are We Going Out of Style (and into Content)?
frontmatter.subtitle: CB Averitt
frontmatter.description: Participants will learn how various CSS techniques affect content exposure and reading order in screen readers. We will offer robust solutions to overcome screen reader limitations and browser inconsistencies. We have tested over two dozen common CSS declarations in the following browser-AT pairings, and will present our results.
